definition: video gaming (as a sport)/e-sports (abbr. to 電競|电竞[dian4 jing4])

sentences.english: Judging by recent form, he should easily pass the exam.
sentences.chinese: 全队经过六个月的训练竞技状态极佳。
收入与指出不平衡的竞技状态。

sentences.english: Uneven bars is a traditional Superior event in women's artistic gymnastics in china.
sentences.chinese: 高低杠项目是我国女子竞技体操的传统优势项目。

sentences.english: More recently, breath-hold diving has become a competitive sport.
sentences.chinese: 最近，屏息潜水已经成为一种竞技运动。

sentences.english: From the Coliseum, Go Back Through the Gate of Constantine.
sentences.chinese: 从古罗马竞技场，往回经过君士坦丁之门。

sentences.english: Race around the clock at the Kings Cup Derby, for non stop racing action.
sentences.chinese: 在王者赛马会这里有永无休止的赛马竞技。

sentences.english: The Olympic Games are a messenger of universal peace and competition in sports.
sentences.chinese: 奥运是世界和平与体育竞技的使者。

sentences.english: It is the consensus of Chinese competitive tennis circle that the tennis game should be professionalized now.
sentences.chinese: 走职业化道路，是中国竞技网球多年来无争的取向。

sentences.english: Sports activities for the general public were extensively developed, and the level of competitivesportscontinued to improve.
sentences.chinese: 全民体育活动广泛开展，竞技体育水平不断提高。

sentences.english: Animals also injured and killed in other rodeo events.
sentences.chinese: 在其他的竞技秀项目中，动物也会受伤或死去。

sentences.english: What sports are called heavy athletics ?
sentences.chinese: 称作重竞技项目的都有哪些项目？

sentences.english: Ozil also served an assist to Ronaldo against Atletico Madrid in the Copa del Rey.
sentences.chinese: 厄齐尔同样在国王杯对阵马德里竞技时助工罗纳尔多。

sentences.english: In the training system of skill-oriented fighting events, research of sportsmans physical optimal is now increasingly being concerned.
sentences.chinese: 技能主导型格斗类项群是我国竞技运动的优势项目。

sentences.english: The existence ofsporting just cause shall be established on a case-by- case basis.
sentences.chinese: 正当的竞技理由是否成立，应结合个案具体分析。

sentences.english: All that talent adds up to zero with a sub-par mental game.
sentences.chinese: 所有的天分在心理竞技中累加为零。

sentences.english: You shall not kill other players, except PVP, Battle ground or Arena.
sentences.chinese: 汝不可杀玩家，除非是在PVP，战场或竞技场。

definition: mobile game/abbr. for 手機遊戲|手机游戏
genuine/legal/see also 盜版|盗版[dao4 ban3]
to play fast and loose with the law/to game the system/(leisure) rules of the game/way of doing an activity/(tourism) way of experiencing a place
video gaming (as a sport)/e-sports (abbr. to 電競|电竞[dian4 jing4])
sporting event/item on program of sports competition
